about_the_game:
Imagine what life would’ve been like for Rahim outside of Harran. Scavenge the streets of Villedor as the gloating runner or take on the lifeless form of his special Infected variant outfit. Make sure to keep your cool as you fend off hordes with the Pickaxe, modified to deal fiery damage, and take to the skies like a pro with a new paraglider that glows in the dark.
It’s time for the original runners to show Nightrunners how it’s really done.

This bundle contains:
  • Rahim Outfit - "Y'know why runners put their lives in danger? For guys like you"
  • Pickaxe - once used by miners to break rocks, now used to break Infected.
  • Rahim's Paraglider - if Rahim saw you flying with this, he'd say, "Not bad...For a noob!"
  • Viral Rahim Outfit - "Try not to slow down once you start running. Out there, if you stop — you're probably dead"
detailed_description:
Imagine what life would’ve been like for Rahim outside of Harran. Scavenge the streets of Villedor as the gloating runner or take on the lifeless form of his special Infected variant outfit. Make sure to keep your cool as you fend off hordes with the Pickaxe, modified to deal fiery damage, and take to the skies like a pro with a new paraglider that glows in the dark.
It’s time for the original runners to show Nightrunners how it’s really done.

This bundle contains:
  • Rahim Outfit - "Y'know why runners put their lives in danger? For guys like you"
  • Pickaxe - once used by miners to break rocks, now used to break Infected.
  • Rahim's Paraglider - if Rahim saw you flying with this, he'd say, "Not bad...For a noob!"
  • Viral Rahim Outfit - "Try not to slow down once you start running. Out there, if you stop — you're probably dead"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100 / AMD Ryzen 3 2300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 560 (4GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 3.6 GHz or higher: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X or Intel i5-8600K or newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2060 6GB or AMD RX Vega 56 8GB or newe
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

short_description: Scavenge the streets of Villedor as the gloating runner or take on the lifeless form of his special Infected variant outfit. If needed, deal fiery damage with the Pickaxe, and fly away with a new paraglider that glows in the dark.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Korean, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Arabic, Czech, Japanese*, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
